ValidationRule.description: Prevents updating sales stage beyond "Discovery" unless certain conditions are met
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.LVGO_Automation_Switch__c.Validations__c, OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Review/Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Contracting"), ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Closed Won")), $Profile.Name <> "Sales Admin", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Finance Team", $UserRole.Name <> "Client Strategy Leadership", ISBLANK( TEXT( Benefit_Consultant_Involved_in_Deal__c )), !ISPICKVAL( Type__c, "Renewal") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate if a Benefit Consultant was involved in this deal. If yes, go to the Partners & Competitors tab and identify the specific partner account as either the Lead Source and/or Influencer relationship.
